description:
A culprit is arrested in the Jack the Ripper case which was solved by the Moriartys. Suspecting a frame-up by Arterton, http://anidb.net/ch116688 [Lestrade] asks http://anidb.net/ch109857 [Sherlock] for help in finding evidence that would prove it. Meanwhile, http://anidb.net/ch116683 [Patterson] works to sneak http://anidb.net/ch117168 [Bond] inside the station.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: The Riot in New Scotland Yard
スコットランドヤード狂騒曲
